name: Farm Blast - Match & Merge
description:
Welcome to the fascinating world of Farm Blast.

Farm Blast is a great puzzle game for those who are looking for an entertaining way to relax their brain and pass the time. Show off your strategic skills; tap and blast the bubbles to solve the puzzles, and build up your farm by completing the levels. Solving puzzles has never been so much fun

This game is easy to play, but challenging to master. You have to pop groups of bubbles of the same color by simply tapping on them. Since you only have a limited number of moves in each level, it depends on your clever blasts and combination of boosters for huge explosions. Try to clear the board with fewer moves to achieve a higher score.

Solve all the puzzles, clear all the levels, reach the target, and win cool boosters.

Rockets, bombs and rainbows will help you smash the blocks and pass the levels easier. Use these great boosters and power-ups at the right time to destroy bubbles, clear the board, collect stars and win great prizes! Simple gameplay, but hard to master.

Apple and Facebook Login are also available! You can continue without losing your progress on any device by logging into your account.

Moreover, 'Daily Events' are here. You have the opportunity to participate in the various events and win even more.

Farm Blast is a free and exciting puzzle game that will keep you hooked for a long time. Get involved in the colorful adventure of Farm Blast; we look forward to your challenge!

So, what are you waiting for?
